text:
Adriano Ossicini (20 June 1920 – 15 February 2019) was an Italian politician and academic. He was the Minister for Family and Social Solidarity in the Dini Cabinet from 1995 to 1996. He was a Senator from 1968 to 1992 and again from 1996 to 2001.
Ossicini was born in Rome. He died on 15 February 2019 from complications of a fall in Rome, aged 98.

annotations.surface_form: Minister for Family and Social Solidarity
